properties.name: traceErrorOnErrorWithThrowable
properties.label: Error with throwable
properties.checkboxLabel: Mark trace as error when an error is logged with a throwable
properties.description: Mark the entire trace as an error any time an error message is logged with a throwable.

properties.name: traceErrorOnErrorWithoutThrowable
properties.label: Error without throwable
properties.checkboxLabel: Mark trace as error when an error is logged without a throwable
properties.description: Mark the entire trace as an error any time an error message is logged without a throwable.

properties.name: traceErrorOnWarningWithThrowable
properties.label: Warning with throwable
properties.checkboxLabel: Mark trace as error when a warning is logged with a throwable
properties.description: Mark the entire trace as an error any time a warning message is logged with a throwable.

properties.name: traceErrorOnWarningWithoutThrowable
properties.label: Warning without throwable
properties.checkboxLabel: Mark trace as error when a warning is logged without a throwable
properties.description: Mark the entire trace as an error any time a warning message is logged without a throwable.
